class Solution:
    def shortestDistanceAfterQueries(self, n: int, queries: List[List[int]]) -> List[int]:
        g = defaultdict(int)
        for at in range(n-1):
            g[at] = at + 1
        inpath = [True] * n

        ans = n-1
        ret = []

        for start, to in queries:
            # print("Query", start, to)
            if not inpath[start]:
                ret.append(ans)
                continue
            at = g[start]
            total = 0
            while at < to:
                inpath[at] = False
                # print(f"{at=}")
                total += 1
                at = g[at]
            
            ans -= total

            if to > g[start]:
                g[start] = to

            ret.append(ans)
        
        return ret
